item.title: HTTP
item.author: james@jamesbvaughan.com (James Vaughan)
item.description: HTTP, or “Hypertext Transfer Protocol”, is one of the most common protocols that computers use to talk to each other. Types of HTTP Requests These requests come in a variety of forms: GET POST PUT DELETE etc. These are all different kinds of “HTTP Requests” and each one is used for a different purpose, but we’re just focus on GET for now. GET Requests You use GET requests all the time and probably don’t even realize it.
